posts.text:
I was so excited when I told you about my plans for the Summer Olympics in LA that I accidentally mentioned the wrong year. The Summer Olympics in LA are of course 2028. So I have plenty of time to plan all the propaganda and train the military that will secure the event.

#Trump #LosAngeles2028

posts.text:
Peace in one day in Ukraine, Donald #Trump?
You brought disruption in supplies of defensive weapons, extorted #Ukraine, commercialized the war, encouraged #Putin and helped #Russia double its war crimes.
You are guilty of aiding and abetting a criminal war.
#Ukrainewar.
www.bbc.com/news/article...
